tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,
review: It was my first visit to the doctor. One thing which I like about him, is that, he was very straight forward. He explained the problem of Osteoarthritis pretty clean, and shared that there is no treatment to it. It will get worse with age. Even though, it felt bad while hearing this, the honest answer is all we need. With some exercise and diet control, the worse state can be delayed but not avoided. I have seen doctors who will prescribe treatments which are meaningless, just to gain more profit from patients. We did took some existing reports to him but, he told the truth that can't be denied.

I had visited the hospital for my mother related to arthritis. Previously we use to check in Punjab. The doctor response was very good. His behavior was good. Medicine was prescribed by the doctor. We had X-ray reports and manually it was diagnosed by doctor. I'm satisfied with the treatment given.  I can recommend doctor to my family or friends. It takes 2 hours to reach, even though we visit. Waiting time was not much in the hospital. She had knee replacement in Punjab. We followed whatever told by Dr. Sanjoy Bagchi. Hospitality was good.

Dr. Sanjoy Bagchi is perhaps the most efficient practitioner in the field of Orthopaedics . He is a very gentle doctor and understands the problem of the patient.
Any injury or accident condition is best treated by him

He has been a saviour for me since 2014 when he saved my life after a free fall from the 5th floor. I visited 2 more doctors for my my knee issue since Nov 2021, and i am still suffering from it. But he could make me almost stand in 2 days after visit. He is amazing.

Doctor are Not Described my problem and when I Ask For surgery Fees Doctor said that His Assistant fees Extra 8000 and Lots of others fees.And they said At first Do all the test Then they told me about my Surgery Fees. * ** **** ******* ************ *** * **** *** **** ********** *** **** **** *********** ******* *** *** ******

My mother had met the doctor, she had spinal related issue.****** *** **** ***** I can recommend doctor to my family or friends. Even for me someone recommended. I am satisfied with the explanation and treatment given. Medicine was prescribed by the doctor. X ray and scanning were done. There was some waiting time in the hospital, it was for only 15 minutes. Hospitality was good but housekeeping staff was an issue, it was a little late. My mother is fine now.
Friendly and professional what else can you ask for? Came to the clinic for a check up of my knees. The doctor explained in detail my problem and the following steps to take
Not ready to listen from patient party regarding previous doctors’ opinions for the same problems. Would have liked had he been a little patient and kept his cool.
Quick consult - doctor was pleasant and caught the problem immediately. Very satisfied with the whole process
He is very friendly doctor. I am fully satisfied his treatment. He explain my problems very nicely .l recommend this doctor.

I visited for back pain related issue, my husband had knee pain. MRI and scanning was done. Still I have pain. Because of covid, we are unable to go. There was waiting time in the hospital.  We both went together.

My aunt had met the doctor and it was for hand injury. *** ****** *** ***** The doctor told to do surgery. Different doctor did the surgery. X-ray was done. I am satisfied with the treatment given.  I have already recommended doctor to my family or friends. Waiting time was not much. Surgery is still not done. My aunt is fine now.

I can recommend the doctor to my family or friends. Waiting time was there in the hospital. My wife is good now.

We had consulted the doctor and it was for knee problem for my mother. *** ****** *** ***** I am satisfied with the treatment given. Calcium tablets were prescribed by the doctor. Exercise and diet was suggested by doctor. I can recommend the doctor to my family or friends. Hospitality was good.
It was a good experience and after taking his medicines I have experienced immense relief in just 2 days.
Thank you,Dr. Sanjoy Bagchi and team AMRI was a very good experience. Courteous staff we were very well guided throughout. Highly experienced Dr.
